issue.title: [CF 506] Rotation helper addon built on top of TMW
issue.body:
I have posted some of my thoughts on http://forums.wowace.com/showthread.php?t=20059.
Hope you might be interested in implementing such features.


> Posted by CurseForge user CuteBunny | Imported from CurseForge issue #506 | Raw

comments.body:
I'm not sure if this would be something that I would be wanting to implement myself, but I will tell you that the reason for the lack of updates for such a long time is that I am currently in the process of writing an entire framework to allow things like this (among many other things, like different display methods) to be build very easily.

Currently, the only real extensibility that exists is in icon types, but even still, there is no support for adding configuration for a custom icon type. Under the new TMW, icon types and their configuration are 100% self-contained, which would make this much more easy to be implemented.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I have quite solid programming experience in JavaScript, its design is quite similar to Lua (prototype/metatable-oriented programming). But I have no experience in making addons in WoW at all. So if you will to be my mentor I would like to join your work. I have an idea to implement something like Ext JS (JavaScript framework) - start from the ground and implement custom class system with support of constructors, inheritance, mixins, statics, getters and setters; create widget system with support of rapid creation based on config object and identifying alias; implement MVC pattern to make all addons be real projects. That are my thoughts which may be far away from yours but I would like to be helpful anyway.


> Posted by CurseForge user CuteBunny

TMW already has its own class library that I wrote. It isn't necessarily the best or the most feature-complete, but it does everything that I have needed it to do so far, and since it is unique to TMW, I can add features to it whenever I want.

Right now I am starting to regret the massive rewrite that I started because I'm at the point where every solution to a problem turns into 2 new problems. I suppose I will get through it though. i am trying to work on it as hard as I can before addons become available in beta and I have to focus my attention on updating for gameplay changes instead of framework changes within TMW.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Going to close this one. I just don't have enough time anymore to be able to devote to TMW and/or to helping you learn TMW's systems so that you can develop for it.

If you are still interested, though, then let me know and maybe we can work something out.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
